name: StarRoads
description:
(way too early alpha)

A shipless 4X
Connect and disconnect worlds,
Grow your civilisation,
Dream.

Art : Anthoine Wattel, Arthur Zerktouni, Melissande Herdier
Lead developper : Fabien Vidal

Warning !! The game is still in very early development. You might start in a map which gets you stuck right from the beginning... !! Warning
